Author: Lunaseki
Text: If you choose to talk to her about it... be gentle. Be understanding. Don’t accuse her. Just ask if she’s going through anything that she wants to talk about. If she resists, tell her that you’re there for her and that you’re worried she’s in a bad place. Don’t push the conversation if she gets upset. Let it sink in for her that her behavior might not be healthy.   I’m not a professional or anything, this is just how I appreciate people discussing my ED with me. I do think it’s helpful to talk to people when you see them struggling. It’s painful to struggle and have “nobody notice” or say anything. That being said, she’s likely to be very, very defensive.
